entities.name: libatius borage
entities.description: Libatius Borage is mentioned as a potions master whose instructions Harry does not follow. He is described as having given instructions that deviated from the Half-Blood Prince's.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is mentioned as a potions master who is impressed by Harry's abilities and praises him in class.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as having difficulty deciphering the handwriting of the Half-Blood Prince's book and not wanting to ask Harry for help.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as being resolutely ploughing on with the 'official' instructions but becoming increasingly bad-tempered as they yield poorer results than the Prince's.

entities.name: half-blood prince
entities.description: The Half-Blood Prince is mentioned as a mysterious figure whose potions book Harry has been following. Harry wonders who he was.

relationships.description: Slughorn praises the Half-Blood Prince's instructions, saying that they have yielded good results for Harry.
Ron struggles to decipher the handwriting of the Half-Blood Prince's book.
